basics.name: Nguyen Huu Loi
basics.title: Senior Fresher Developer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable applications and mentoring teams. Specialized in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies.

highlights: Led a team of 5 developers in building a microservices architecture
Reduced system response time by 40% through optimization
Implemented CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time by 60%
Developed and maintained multiple React applications
Implemented automated testing increasing code coverage to 85%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
